paramNodes.description:
{
	"log":{},
	"id":"long //代理信息ID",
	"userId":"long //提交用户id",
	"companyName":"string //公司名称",
	"certId":"string //统一社会信用代码",
	"principalName":"string //校长姓名",
	"mobile":"string //手机号码",
	"cardId":"string //身份证号码",
	"agentArea":"string //代理区域",
	"perTrainNumber":"string //机构运营情况(每期培训学生人数)",
	"agentAddress":"string //机构运营具体地址",
	"status":"int //代理状态 1：审核中 2：审核完成",
	"isDeleted":"int //是否删除：0否 1是",
	"gmtCreate":"date //添加时间",
	"gmtModified":"date //更新时间"
}
paramNodes.name: agentInfo

paramNodes.description:
{
	"answerId":"long //答题ID",
	"subjectRequestId":"long //学科题目id",
	"isCorrect":"int //是否正确：0否 1是",
	"isWrongCollection":"int //是否加入错题集：0否 1是",
	"isFinishAnswer":"int //是否完成答题：0否 1是",
	"answerDuration":"long //答题使用时长（秒）"
}
